name: Moissa Wight
effectText: This card's name becomes "Skull Servant" while in the GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Skull Servant" or 1 card that mentions it from your Deck to your hand, except "Moissa Wight", also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters. You can only use this effect of "Moissa Wight" once per turn. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)
